Method Detail

onStart

public abstract boolean onStart()
Called before loop() is first called, after this plugin has been initialized with all method providers. Override to perform any initialization or prevent plugin start.

Returns:
true if the plugin can start.

public abstract void onFinish()
Perform actions upon stopping the plugin;

deactivate

public final void deactivate(int id)
For internal use only. Deactivates this plugin if the appropriate id is provided.

Parameters:
id - The id from pluginHandler.

For internal use only. Sets the pool id of this plugin.

Parameters:
id - The id from pluginHandler.

public final boolean isActive()
Returns whether or not the plugin is running and enabled.

true if active; otherwise false.
